metadata.description: Consumable items crafted through alchemy discipline
metadata.note: All potions, elixirs, oils, and utility consumables

metadata.narrative: Combining all basic elements into a harmony potion. Ancient earth, flowing water, crackling fire merge into perfect balance. All elemental forces recognize you as kin and refuse to harm their own.

items.name: Elemental Harmony Potion
items.effect: Grants resistance to all elements for 10 minutes

metadata.narrative: Creating universal solvent from pure void essence and radiant light gems. The void essence makes it unstable, the voidstone makes it hungry. Handle with extreme care—it wants to unmake things.

items.name: Universal Solvent
items.effect: Can dissolve most materials, use carefully

metadata.narrative: Oil combining earth crystal stability with ancient golem resilience. Craftsmen swear by this formula. Apply it before work and watch efficiency soar as tools glide through materials.

items.name: Efficiency Oil
items.effect: Apply to tools for +15% gathering speed for 1 hour

metadata.narrative: Polish infused with shadow essence and granite dust. Knights pay fortunes for this ancient formula. The dark sheen isn't just for show—it actually turns blades and absorbs impact.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.effect: Apply to armor for +8 defense for 2 hours

metadata.narrative: Legendary elixir binding void essence with lightning and ancient cores. Drink and reality forgets you exist. Light bends around you, footsteps make no sound, you become shadow given form.
Potion using dire beast essence and compressed air crystals. Gills form temporarily, lungs adapt to extract oxygen from water. Swim through ocean depths as naturally as breathing air.
Simple antidote from lightning-charged ichor. The electrical current purges toxins, living essence repairs damage. Bitter taste, immediate relief from most common poisons.

items.name: Antidote
items.effect: Cures poison and grants immunity for 60 seconds

metadata.narrative: Mana restoration potion using light gems and grounding earth crystals. Magical reserves surge back, spell-weary mind clears. The radiant energy tastes like captured starlight.

The legendary Philosopher's Stone—void essence bound with dragon scale and storm-captured lightning. Transmutes base metals to gold, grants wisdom beyond mortal ken. Alchemists spend lifetimes seeking this formula.

items.name: Philosopher's Stone
items.effect: Enables transmutation of metals and advanced alchemy

metadata.narrative: Berserker elixir combining dire beast ferocity with void-touched iron scales. Rage floods your veins, pain becomes distant. Strength magnifies dramatically but caution fades—pure combat fury.
Simple courage brew from water crystals and slime gel. Calms nerves, steadies hands, emboldens the timid. Every adventurer's first companion before facing the unknown.

items.name: Liquid Courage
items.effect: Reduces fear effects and grants +5% defense

metadata.narrative: Levitation elixir using phoenix ash and essence blood. Gravity's hold weakens, body becomes lighter than air. Float, drift, soar—the ground becomes optional for a precious time.
Crystallizing raw storm energy into stable lightning shards. Storm hearts provide the power, limestone grounds and contains it. The result crackles with barely-contained electrical fury.

items.name: Lightning Shard
items.effect: Crystallized lightning for crafting and enchanting

metadata.narrative: Haste potion binding ancient golem endurance with frost essence and air crystals. Time seems to slow around you. Your movements blur, strikes land before enemies can blink.
Basic healing potion from simple slime gel and beetle shell. Every alchemist's first creation—ingredients common, technique straightforward. Wounds close within moments despite the terrible taste.
Improved healing potion using enchanted earth crystals and living ichor. The magical enhancement amplifies restorative properties. One swallow and you feel strength returning to weary limbs.
Powerful healing elixir using shadow-touched lightning and spectral essence. Closes wounds rapidly, mends broken bones, restores vitality from the edge of death. The taste of life itself.
Strength-enhancing elixir using weathered iron scales and fire essence. Muscles surge with power, every strike hits harder. Feel ancient battle-fury flowing through your veins.
Defense-boosting potion using enchanted air crystals and dire beast fangs. Skin hardens like iron, spectral threads weave protective barriers. Blows that should fell you merely bruise.
Speed-enhancing draught using shadow wolf essence and ancient earth. Time slows around you, your movements blur impossibly fast. Strikes land before enemies can react to your presence.
Fire resistance potion using weathered water essence and lightning shards. Body temperature regulates perfectly even in extreme heat. Walk through flames unscathed, fire becomes gentle warmth.
Frost resistance potion using enchanted phoenix ash and blessed water. Internal warmth shields against killing cold. Ice shatters against your skin, blizzards feel like spring breezes.
Regeneration tonic combining shadow-touched ancient cores with radiant light gems. Your body remembers how to heal itself. Wounds close steadily, vitality flows back like rising tide.

items.name: Regeneration Tonic
items.effect: Restores 80 HP instantly and 6 HP per second

metadata.narrative: Legendary brew combining ancient storm hearts with weathered golem essence. Maximum HP surges dramatically, strength magnifies beyond mortal limits. For precious minutes, you become titan-like.

Transmuting enchanted copper through alchemical earth essence. Molecular structure shifts, copper becomes tin through elemental persuasion. The transformation requires precise balance and magical will.
Transmuting weathered tin into steel through water essence and coal fusion. Heat, pressure, elemental binding—iron transforms into superior alloy. The process mirrors natural forging but faster.
Refining blessed living ichor through frost essence concentration. The essence crystallizes into pure blood, power condensed. What was dilute becomes potent—elemental vitality in physical form.

items.name: Essence Blood
items.effect: Crystallized elemental blood for high-tier crafting

metadata.narrative: Crystallizing raw flame energy using storm hearts and frost-touched limestone. The stone absorbs and transforms primordial fire. Result: stable fire crystals pulsing with trapped heat.

items.name: Fire Crystal
items.effect: Crystallized fire for crafting and enchanting

metadata.narrative: Combining blessed elemental crystals into perfect harmony. Fire, water, earth, air—all ancient forces balanced in single vessel. Drink and become recognized as kin by all elements.

items.name: Elemental Harmony Potion
items.effect: Grants resistance to all elements for 10 minutes

metadata.narrative: Creating universal solvent from cracked diamond and damaged storm essence. The imperfections make it unstable, desperately seeking completion by dissolving everything. Handle with utmost care.

items.name: Universal Solvent
items.effect: Can dissolve most materials, use carefully

metadata.narrative: Oil combining weathered slime gel with fire essence and ancient blood. The aged ingredients create superior efficiency formula. Apply before work and watch productivity soar.

items.name: Efficiency Oil
items.effect: Apply to tools for +18% gathering speed for 1 hour

metadata.narrative: Polish infused with blessed granite and lightning essence. Holy warriors favor this sanctified formula. The divine sheen deflects both physical and spiritual attacks with equal effectiveness.

items.name: Armor Polish
items.effect: Apply to armor for +10 defense for 2 hours

metadata.narrative: Legendary elixir from cracked essence blood and damaged void essence. The flaws make invisibility unpredictable but potent. Reality struggles to perceive you, light bends reluctantly around unstable form.
Potion using blessed fire crystals and holy air essence. Temporary gills form, blessed by divine waters. Breathe underwater as naturally as breathing air, swim ocean depths safely.
Simple antidote from damaged living ichor and cracked frost essence. Despite imperfect ingredients, purges toxins effectively. The cold burns poison away, damaged essence repairs what remains.

items.name: Antidote
items.effect: Cures poison and grants immunity for 45 seconds

metadata.narrative: Mana restoration potion using rough limestone and crude lightning essence. Basic formula but effective. Magical reserves surge back, spell-weary mind clears despite the gritty texture.

The legendary Philosopher's Stone from diminished materials. Dull void essence, faded spectral threads, weathered phoenix ash—even imperfect, the formula works. Lesser transmutations, but transmutation nonetheless.

items.name: Philosopher's Stone
items.effect: Enables transmutation of metals and advanced alchemy

metadata.narrative: Berserker elixir combining frozen living ichor with legendary phoenix ash. Ice and fire war within—the conflict creates explosive strength. Rage floods veins, caution vanishes, pure fury remains.
Simple courage brew from rough slime gel and crude earth crystal. Unrefined but effective. Steadies nerves, emboldens the timid—every beginner's companion before facing danger.

items.name: Liquid Courage
items.effect: Reduces fear effects and grants +3% defense

metadata.narrative: Levitation elixir using crystalline living ichor and void essence. The crystallization makes levitation more stable. Float gracefully, drift effortlessly—gravity becomes mere suggestion.
Crystallizing raw storm energy from pale storm hearts and washed granite. Weakened materials produce dimmer lightning shards. Still crackles with electrical fury, just less intensely.

items.name: Lightning Shard
items.effect: Crystallized lightning for crafting and enchanting

metadata.narrative: Haste potion binding soft fire essence with malleable lightning and spectral threads. The pliable ingredients create smooth acceleration. Time slows gently around you, movements flow like water.
Basic healing potion from luminous beetle carapace and glowing slime gel. The natural bioluminescence enhances healing properties. Wounds close quickly with a faint shimmer.
Improved healing potion using polished living ichor and refined water crystals. The careful preparation amplifies effectiveness. One swallow and strength flows back into weary body.
Powerful healing elixir using brilliant frost essence and radiant blood. The luminous ingredients create extraordinary restoration. Closes mortal wounds, mends shattered bones—life itself condensed.
Strength-enhancing elixir using fire-blessed living ichor and blazing wolf essence. Flame-touched ingredients ignite inner strength. Muscles surge with burning power, strikes hit devastatingly hard.
Defense-boosting potion using polished living ichor and refined spectral essence. The careful preparation creates superior protection. Skin hardens like iron, ethereal barriers reinforce flesh.
Speed-enhancing draught using brilliant golem essence and radiant earth. The luminous ingredients create extraordinary acceleration. Time nearly stops around you, movements become lightning-fast.
Fire resistance potion using blazing earth essence and frost balance. The fire-touched ingredients paradoxically enhance fire protection. Walk through infernos safely, flames become harmless warmth.
Frost resistance potion using polished void essence and refined water crystals. The careful preparation creates superior cold protection. Ice shatters harmlessly, blizzards feel like gentle breezes.
